name: ui-test-seed
description: Template for UI test automation project, using CucumberJS and Selenium3

scripts.test: cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require support/**/*.js --require step_definitions/**/*.js -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:cucumber.json --format-options "{\"colorsEnabled\": true}"
scripts.test-local: cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require support/**/*.js --require step_definitions/**/*.js -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:cucumber.json --format-options "{\"colorsEnabled\": true}"
scripts.test-report: cucumber-js features/**/*.feature --require support/**/*.js --require step_definitions/**/*.js -f node_modules/cucumber-pretty --format json:cucumber.json --format-options "{\"colorsEnabled\": true}" --publish

author: Laszlo Szikszai <laszlo_szikszai@epam.com>
